alert.note: Alert for Sonoma (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 4:24PM PST until further notice by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in San Francisco CA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in California... Russian River at Johnsons Beach near Guerneville affecting Sonoma County. .Heavy rain is expected on Wednesday into Thursday. Rapid rises are expected with the river reaching flood stage by Thursday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding. * WHERE...Russian River at Johnsons Beach near Guerneville. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM PST Tuesday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 11.2 feet tomorrow afternoon. Additional rises are expected thereafter with a crest around 35 feet expected by Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 430 AM PST.
